title: Ticks History Request
description: Get historic tick data for a given symbol.

ticks_history.description: Short symbol name (obtained from the `active_symbols` call).

end.description: Epoch value representing the latest boundary of the returned ticks. If `latest` is specified, this will be the latest available timestamp.

adjust_start_time.description: 1 - if the market is closed at the end time, or license limit is before end time, adjust interval backwards to compensate.

count.description: An upper limit on ticks to receive.

granularity.description: Only applicable for style: `candles`. Candle time-dimension width setting. (default: `60`).

passthrough.description: Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: Used to map request to response.

start.description:
Epoch value representing the earliest boundary of the returned ticks. 
- For `"style": "ticks"`: this will default to 1 day ago.
- For `"style": "candles"`: it will default to 1 day ago if count or granularity is undefined.

subscribe.description: 1 - to send updates whenever a new tick is received.
